choices: Story 2:  A jewel covered red purse
Story 4:  A small light blue purse
1.content: One day, you were walking down the street in your town. You trip over something, and fall to the ground. Wincing in pain, you look to see what you tripped on. It was none other than a purse. What kind of purse was it?
1.title: Your adventures begin...

info.brief_description: You find a purse on the street as man that will transform you once you pick it up.
info.description:
You start out as a male human of any age. You find a purse that someone drops. The last owner who had it is what you become.

Rules:
1.) Sex is okay.
2.) No ending the story, no short chapters, and no one-choice chapters.
3.) I will award Gift Points for very well written chapters.
4.) Please use proper spelling and grammar. Be as descriptive as possible.
